lead_paragraph: COHEN--Philip M. Age 86, died July 3, 2016. Survived by his loving wife, Liliana, daughters, Martha Cohen Stine, Amy Z. Cohen, Dr. Susan Hirsch and Patricia Epstein Putney, stepsons, Robert and Andrew Romano, 13 grandchildren (predeceased by Benjamin Ziegelbaum), sister, Norma Barasch and former wife, Harriet Newman Cohen. Accomplished musician, chemist, businessman, avid skier and tennis player. Forever in our hearts. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  COHEN, PHILIP M
